mapper.update: update request_history set employee_code = #{employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_name = #{employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_url = #{request_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_time = #{request_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, response_time = #{response_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, request_method = #{request_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, response_data_len = #{response_data_len,jdbcType=INTEGER}, request_param = #{request_param,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, request_data = #{request_data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, response_data = #{response_data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where request_history_id = #{request_history_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select request_history_id, employee_code, employee_name, request_url, request_time, response_time, request_method, response_data_len, request_param, request_data, response_data from request_history where request_history_id = #{request_history_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select request_history_id, employee_code, employee_name, request_url, request_time, response_time, request_method, response_data_len, request_param, request_data, response_data from request_history
